import React, { useState } from "react"; const LoginForm = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [role, setRole] = useState('patient'); function handleLogin(e) { e.preventDefault(); const user = { email, password, role }; console.log(user); } return (
